Class ReservationController

java.lang.Object

public class ReservationController
extends java.lang.Object
Control class between ReservationModule and Reservation Entity

    • assignReservationTable

      public boolean assignReservationTable​(Reservation reservation)
      Assign a table to a reservation based on capacity
      Parameters:
      reservation - The reservation object to act on
      Returns:
      A boolean to indicate whether the assignment was successful

    • isTableReserved

      public boolean isTableReserved​(int tableNumber) throws java.lang.Exception
      Check if a table is reserved The table is retrieved using table number
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - Table number to retrieve
      Returns:
      The retrieved table object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when there is no table found

    • getTableAvailabilityByPax

      Parameters:
      pax - The pax number to cater for
      Returns:
      An ArrayList consisting of all suitable tables
